section.title: How to Restart Content Fusion Enterprise
section.p: To restart Content Fusion Enterprise, run the following two commands in a command-line interface:sudo bash /fusion/admin/stop-content-fusion.sh sudo bash /fusion/admin/start-content-fusion.sh

section.title: How to Stop Content Fusion Enterprise
section.p: To stop Content Fusion Enterprise, run the following command in a command-line interface:sudo bash /fusion/admin/stop-content-fusion.sh

section.title: How to Restart the Web-Based Editor
section.p:
If you make certain customizations to the web-based editor (for example, if you upload a custom framework, or customize the terms list for the spell checker or AutoCorrect feature), you need to restart the web-based editor (Web Author):
Go to your Content Fusion Enterprise Administration Page.
In the Web Author tab, click Manage Web Author. This will open the Oxygen XML Web Author Administration page.
Select Frameworks.
Click the Restart Server button at the top of the page.
